body_html: since the TF community is growing so rapidly, I'm not sure if the TF devs at Google will have bandwidth to scale with this growth. Just an idea: How about we start something unofficial where anyone interested in TF can log on and ask questions to the room? This will also cut down the number of duplicate issues we are seeing here.

body: since the TF community is growing so rapidly, I'm not sure if the TF devs at Google will have bandwidth to scale with this growth. Just an idea: How about we start something unofficial where anyone interested in TF can log on and ask questions to the room? This will also cut down the number of duplicate issues we are seeing here.
